::Nemesis Enforcer/Prowl::

Prowl sneaks silently toward Nemesis Enforcer his weapon ready. He reaches 
into his storage compartment, taking out Iron Raptor's silencer.

"Try to use the silencer on Dark One. A scream won't do us much good."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Nemesis Enforcer smiles evily, walking toward Iron Raptor with the bug. He 
reaches up, lifting the bug toward her neck.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Suddenly, Nemesis is jerked back, feeling something on his face as Prowl 
places the silencer over his mouth.

Prowl smashes his weapon into the side of Nemesis' head, two holes seemingly 
forming out of nowhere (the weapon is cloaked). Nemesis screams, the scream 
only audible in the ears of Prowl and Dinobot as the silencer absorbs the 
sound.

Prowl lowers Nemesis carefully to the floor, hoping that Dinobot will do his 
job well. He walks over to the wall by Iron Raptor, pulling on a switch, the 
energon bonds that held Iron Raptor in place deactivating.
